prompts.improve: Improve code quality, readability, and maintainability. Focus on: better naming, simpler logic, removing duplication.
prompts.refactor: Refactor code to follow React best practices. Consider: custom hooks, component composition, separation of concerns.
prompts.add-tests: Add comprehensive unit tests using Jest and React Testing Library. Cover edge cases and error scenarios.
prompts.fix-bugs: Identify and fix potential bugs: null checks, race conditions, memory leaks, incorrect state updates.
prompts.add-comments: Add helpful JSDoc comments for functions, complex logic explanations, and TODO markers for improvements.
prompts.optimize: Optimize for performance: memoization, lazy loading, avoiding unnecessary re-renders, efficient algorithms.
